modName: Come together N Out of the way - Nausicaa-S Tweaker
summary:
If your follows blocking your way, you can move them into a simple menu manipulation.
Also, if the distance of your follows too far, you can close them by simple menu manipulation
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eaHPwhw.gif[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OsCwJlr.png[/img]

I can't speak English well.

If your follows blocking your way, you can move them into a simple menu manipulation.
Also, if the distance of your follows too far, you can close them by simple menu manipulation

This is a new function in the Nausicaa's tweaker.
It has more functions.
For more information, see the previous posts of the Nausicaa's Tweaker!
previous version : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32977]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32977[/url]

It show & modify an abilities of the player & selected NPCs (include monster & dragon).
You can move NPCs to your front or their original location.
You can go to selected NPC. You can resurrect dead NPCs.
In addition, you can save selected NPCS to the list.
Anytime, anywhere you can operate them in list.

[b][i] [size=14]Update[/size][/i][/b]
Ver 1.2a
If fellow list & NPC list lock up, Overwrite it to 1.2 main. But, 1.2a not support to sort list.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OSHb1AW.gif[/img]

___________ Come together ______________
[youtube]wqED7D8wLkM[/youtube]
___________ Out of the way ______________
[youtube]75AKa22dFww[/youtube]

1. Skyrim default
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rvi41L2.png[/img]

2. Come together - more closer
[img]http://i.imgur.com/inq2rtK.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/GKq02Ux.gif[/img]

[color=red]SKYUI 3.1+ and SKSE 1.6.9+ is required. Skyrim 1.8.151+
It supports Skyrim 1.9.29.8[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/MmO5hRD.gif[/img]
1. MCM menu – select “Nausicaa’s Tweaker”
2. Select "Come together"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To anyone thats not sure how to select a NPC (as I was even after reading the manual)

You put your crosshairs on the NPC of your choice and hit F2 a Green flash will cover the NPC for a second.

Then open "Nausicaa's Tweaker" in MCM.
The NPC you selected will be in the TARGET selection.
If they are a follower you wish to have fast access to add them to Fellow list.
If they are normal NPC's you wish to have fast access to add them to NPC list.

If you don't want NPC to die, put a check in the invulnerable box.
(adding to list is not required)

Clicking on a name in the Fellow or NPC List will place that NPC back in the TARGET section (actor tab) for reediting.

Remove Outfit = removes NPC's Outfit when targeted (F2)

Thank You Grimblight
